Package maze

Interface MazeBuilder

  • public interface MazeBuilder
    A MazeBuilder provides a set of methods for connecting Rooms in a way that is manageable for constructing a Maze.
    Author:
    jcollard, jddevaug

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MazeBuilder addOneWayPassage​(Room fromRoom, Room toRoom)
      Creates a passage from fromRoom to toRoom such that toRoom is added to the ListInterface returned by fromRoom's Room.getRooms() method.
      MazeBuilder addPassage​(Room room0, Room room1)
      Creates a passage between room0 and room1 such that room1 is added to the ListInterface returned by room0's Room.getRooms() method and room0 is added to the ListInterface returned by room1's Room.getRooms() method.
      Room createExit​(java.lang.String longDescription, java.lang.String shortDescription)
      Creates a Room with the specified descriptions.
      Room createRoom​(java.lang.String longDescription, java.lang.String shortDescription)
      Creates a Room with the specified descriptions.

    • Method Detail

      • createRoom

        Room createRoom​(java.lang.String longDescription,
                java.lang.String shortDescription)

        Creates a Room with the specified descriptions.

        The returned Room is guaranteed to have no Rooms in the ListInterface returned by its Room.getRooms() method.

        The returned Room's Room.isExit() method must return false.

        Parameters:
        longDescription - the long description for the Room
        shortDescription - the short description for the Room
        Returns:
        a newly created Room with the specified descriptions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if longDescription or shortDescription are null.

      • createExit

        Room createExit​(java.lang.String longDescription,
                java.lang.String shortDescription)

        Creates a Room with the specified descriptions.

        The returned Room is guaranteed to have no Rooms in the ListInterface returned by its Room.getRooms() method.

        The returned Room's Room.isExit() method must return true.

        Parameters:
        longDescription - the long description for the Room
        shortDescription - the short description for the Room
        Returns:
        a newly created Room with the specified descriptions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if longDescription or shortDescription are null.

      • addPassage

        MazeBuilder addPassage​(Room room0,
                       Room room1)

        Creates a passage between room0 and room1 such that room1 is added to the ListInterface returned by room0's Room.getRooms() method and room0 is added to the ListInterface returned by room1's Room.getRooms() method.

        If room0 is already in room1's Room.getRooms()'s list then room1 should not be modified.

        If the room1 is already in room0's Room.getRooms()'s ListInterface then room0 should not be modified.

        For convenience, this MazeBuilder is returned

        Parameters:
        room0 - the first of two Rooms to be connected
        room1 - the second of two Rooms to be connected
        Returns:
        this MazeBuilder
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if room0 or room1 are null

      • addOneWayPassage

        MazeBuilder addOneWayPassage​(Room fromRoom,
                             Room toRoom)

        Creates a passage from fromRoom to toRoom such that toRoom is added to the ListInterface returned by fromRoom's Room.getRooms() method.

        If toRoom is already in fromRoom's Room.getRooms()'s ListInterface then fromRoom should not be modified.

        For convenience, this MazeBuilder is returned

        Parameters:
        fromRoom - the room from which the passage is accessible
        toRoom - the room for which the passage goes to
        Returns:
        this MazeBuilder
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if fromRoom or toRoom are null
